title: Absolutely horrific teammates
body:
I haven't played in a few months, and my last 6 games since i started again were all loses, the first one with urgot was my fault, the other 5 were from bad teammates who either didn't know what they were doing or were trolling, cept for that jhin on my other urgot, he was a toxic dick.

Is there anyway to get teammates that aren't completely incompetent cause that's why i quit last year cause most of my teams were shit, even if we won they still sucked overall and we won from pure luck. Shouldn't level 20-30's know how to play the game by now?

replies.body:
Well, if you're talking about playing on that account, you are unlikely to play with a lot of people that know what they are doing. The learning curve for League is steep and it takes a while to really learn most of the basics properly. Hit 30 first, then focus on improving yourself, because you can't exactly improve those around you very much. If you really are better than those around you you will tend to climb up in Rank/MMR and start playing with people that know better.

Looking at your matches, you don't seem to know any better than your teammates (which is fine, it's expected); watch high elo streamers and pros, read guides, ask for tips, and keep practicing.

I have considered that. And thusly have decided that yes i suck at these trash games, but my teammates are even worse.
im done with this trash genre for good. i cant count on any of you idiots but myself.
When you can consistently go 8/1/12 in losing games THEN you may complain about your team mates, until then get practising.

lv20-30 are fresh new and tend to be clueless and horrible. They run aimlessly, build bizarre items, die over and over and are often toxic children not yet weeded out.

You will start seeing more intelligent people in normal games a bit past 30. This year lowered the exp needed to reach 30, so the current new lv30 is more like the lv20 of last year. And they can play ranked immediately.
Did you try not being a boosted animal?

Have you considered that maybe you are the one who is bad?
 js
